												Why is everyone hating on this? It's legit a straight rip off of City Car driving. A currently as of 22 January 17 is £15+ on steam. This game is £0.59p as of 17/1/17. It works with my G920 wheel, and is pretty fluid with a slight bit of lag at the start but ends after 30 seconds as the game is loading in. I've had no issues with running this game, the menu isn't too good to say the least, but i've seen much worse for £10+ games.
